name: Lacuna (HugoLCSB, Ambart, Millezenith)
description:
<This is only a demo of the Project>

Lalcuna is puzzle platformer in which the player has the mechanic to swap between a physical and a spirit form, one cannot live without the other and both are needed to solve the puzzles. After the world has lost its touch to the spiritual world, you have to learn new pieces of wisdom and use the different perspective of your spirit to shape the world around you. The final goal is to regain your colour and harmony by reinstating the awareness that you need to work together with every bit of yourself in order to move forward in life. 

Hugo Baptista - <Developer>

Ambar Troya - <Artist>

Alexander Mihlzén - <Composer/SFX>

Carl Stoffel - <Jr.Dev/Level-Design>
